
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18716052" title="发布于 2025-02-14 20:08">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">腾讯元宝接入 DeepSeek R1 模型，支持深度思考 + 联网搜索，好用不卡机！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">前言</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">腾讯元宝AI产品于2025年2月13日在应用商店发布更新，正式接入了DeepSeek R1模型，并宣布该模型已联网、满血上线，DeepSeek+腾讯混元，好用不卡机。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250214200443954-133755339.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">腾讯元宝介绍</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">腾讯元宝是依托于腾讯混元、DeepSeek等大模型，基于跨知识领域和自然语言理解能力的大模型AI产品。元宝期望通过AI能力帮助用户在逻辑推理、职场办公、知识学习、趣味创作、生活百科等多个领域提高效率和生活辅助，感受 AI 带来的全新体验。同时，通过联网搜索信息，腾讯元宝能够确保推理和回答的时新性和权威性。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>访问地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://yuanbao.tencent.com/chat" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://yuanbao.tencent.com/chat</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250214200519811-268067019.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">DeepSeek R1模型</h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250214200540440-1761099871.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">腾讯混元模型</h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250214200551085-2063960445.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250214200554981-1617348050.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250214200600963-796128404.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250214200606875-1551425551.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">产品功能</h2>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250214200622941-250965032.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>AIGC&amp;AI赋能</span></h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250214200648607-1864741635.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">DeepSeek从入门到精通免费教程</h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>DeepSeek官方访问地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://chat.deepseek.com" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://chat.deepseek.com</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510076&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=aeebf5e150abb989e1c273d5bf5e0f82&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">清华大学推出的 DeepSeek 从入门到精通（104页）免费教程！</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247510105&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=eb1cbbe9a4e0446a26d35111da93f6b8&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">告别 DeepSeek 系统繁忙，七个 DeepSeek 曲线救国平替入口，官网崩溃也能用！</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<blockquote data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<p>公众号「<strong>追逐时光者</strong>」回复关键字领取下载链接：<strong>DeepSeek</strong></p>
</blockquote>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250214200725128-1965338949.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250214200729578-1264655700.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202502/1336199-20250214200736166-2094697562.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">DeepSeek应用场景</h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>智能办公：自动生成会议纪要、撰写商业文书、数据分析报告。</li>
<li>教育辅助：个性化习题讲解、学习方案定制、论文润色。</li>
<li>开发支持：代码自动补全、技术文档生成、系统设计建议。</li>
<li>商业分析：行业研究报告生成、竞品分析、市场趋势预测。</li>
<li>客户服务：7×24智能问答、工单<span>自动分类、多轮对话接待。</span></li>
<li>等等等......。</li>
</ul>
</div>
